synopsis:
Arale saves a baby shark at the beach and in gratitude the sharks invite she and her family to visit the Underwater Kingdom.
(Source: ANN)

title.en: Dr. Slump and Arale-chan: Hoyoyo!! Follow the Rescued Shark...
title.jp: Dr. Slump Movie 08: Arale-chan Hoyoyo!! Tasuketa Same ni Tsurerarete...
